``` ::: ::: ## Змінні | Variable | Descripton | |---------------|----------------------------------------------------| | `game_id` | An unique ID for the game | | `game_date` | Game date | | `game_number` | Game number | | `home_team` | Name of the home team, abbreviated | | `away_team` | Name of the away team, abbreviated | | `opponent` | The team NC Courage played against | | `home_pts` | Number of points by the home team | | `away_pts` | Number of points by the away team | | `result` | Result of the game for NC Courage (win, loss, tie) | | `season` | Season (2017, 2018, or 2019) |
